tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE drug_interactions (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_id UUID,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255),
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Patient (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  weight FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Medications (
  medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_name VARCHAR(255),
  dosage FLOAT,
  frequency VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE DrugInteractions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_name VARCHAR(255),
  severity VARCHAR(50),
  medication_1_id INT,
  medication_2_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE AdverseReactions (
  reaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reaction_name VARCHAR(255),
  patient_id INT,
  medication_id INT,
  date_occurred DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MedicationRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_id INT,
  dosage_taken FLOAT,
  date_prescribed DATE
)
